content:
We started a weekly Lean Hangout and had the first one yesterday.
https://x.com/nileshtrivedi/status/1995402775736324240

Connected with @T V H Prathamesh among others.

Would love to meet others from India online. Also thinking about hosting offline meetups at our office in BLR.
I'll be arriving in Bangalore soon for a few weeks and would love to join for the offline meetups.

This is great to hear! I won't be able to join your 7 December event as it will be 4 am for me in the US, but I will soon be travelling to more convenient time zones. I don't know when I'll be in Bangalore next, but if there happens to be an offline meetup at a time when I'm there, I'd love to join!
@Anand Rao Tadipatri When will you arrive? We can plan something for software professionals.
I'll be in Bangalore between the 6th of December (this Saturday) and the 11th of January. That sounds good to me.
How about 7th (Sunday) in conjunction with the online hangout? https://luma.com/qfvova46
Unfortunately I don't think I'll be able to make it on the 7th since I'll be at a family gathering, but I look forward to attending the subsequent sessions.
I created this Luma calendar so people can stay updated about new online/offline meetups: https://luma.com/leanhangout
Thanks! Will there be a corresponding offline event this Sunday? I'm travelling at the moment but I may be back in Bangalore just in time to make it.
@Anand Rao Tadipatri No, not planned yet. I am spreading the word about the workshop @ IISc Bangalore on 19th December, so that would act like a physical meetup of sorts.

We will have an informal workshop on Lean at IISc, Bangalore on 2025-12-19T09:30:00+05:30 which is an introduction to Lean focussed on programming (rather than mathematics).

The two main speakers will be @Anand Rao Tadipatri and myself.

The workshop is free and is funded under a grant from Renaissance Philanthropy. However, as we need to know the number of participants please register by Monday, December 15, 2025 if you are interested in attending.

@Divyanshu Ranjan Here is the coming Sunday's event: https://luma.com/bcgelh11
You can bookmark this URL for all future events: https://luma.com/leanhangout
